TopicTitle: Launching an animated pick-a-path adventure - in SPACE!

Articles.Content:
Hi Kerbonauts, I'm Lunniy Korabl, you may (or may not) remember the Weka spaceplane mod I made back when the Mun was the only destination.

Spoiler

I'm a VFX artist by trade, and I wanted to share this webseries I'm about to launch. Crafted with miniature practical effects and digital animation, Hyperluminal is a pick-a-path series where you also get to pick the paths that get to be picked (it's pick-a-path sqaured!)

Spoiler



The trailer is done and ready to drop, and you can find heaps more teasers on the official Hyperluminal twitter. Obviously pick-a-path^2 is going to be a lot of work, so I'm looking to crowdfund either on a platform like kickstarter, where I would need to raise enough funds to cover the whole project at once, or with a patreon where I could do a lot of behind the scenes fx and science content in between each major episode to keep patrons interested long term.

I figured this would be a good community to guage interest in such a project. Do you prefer to back kickstarters or patreons for fun science fiction/fact content, and what sort of rewards are you most interested in?
